Larry Lane - promotion details** ‚Üí Promotions (11:00) - Synthesize Summit & Hackathon survey results ‚Üí deck for Byron *(due Sat 1/24)* - Create Innovation Sprint plan ‚Üí deliver to Byron *(due Sat 1/24)* - Larry, Mark & Brooke promotion ‚Üí Promotions (11:00) - Get Perficient Proposal *(due Fri 1/30)* ‚Üí EA Assessment (14:00) ### üî• Open Threads to Track **From Yesterday:** - [ ] Define Innovation Sprint framework #p1 ‚Äî rally troops today - [ ] Synthesize Summit & Hackathon survey results ‚Äî deck for Byron, due Sat - [ ] Shanna development ‚Äî encourage more business engagement - [ ] Email Hiram Morero ‚Äî Producer Org needs - [ ] Talk to TJ ‚Äî CISO Assessment **From Tuesday:** - [ ] Negotiate Salesforce credits ($99K) ‚Äî update Byron in 2-3 weeks - [ ] Megan: Autocert exec deck ‚Äî Crema vs Injala - [ ] Promotion timing ‚Äî target 2/1 - [ ] Harish contractor decision ‚Äî deadline 2/28 ### üîó Connections Today - **Byron** (via All Hands) ‚Äî Survey synthesis + Innovation Sprint plan due Sat - **Hackathon Winners** ‚Üí Innovation Sprint kick-off ‚Äî your #1 priority - **Promotions** ‚Üí Larry, Mark & Brooke, Amal, Mohan ‚Äî 2/1 target - **Perficient EA Assessment** ‚Üí G3 visibility, proposal due 1/30 - **Crema Discussion** ‚Üí Continues from Tuesday's Autocert discussion - **HIVE Final SOW** ‚Üí G2 Innovation pilot with Nuvento ### ‚ö†Ô∏è Heads Up 1. **Calendar Conflict at 16:00** ‚Äî Crema vs Onit. Prioritize or reschedule. 2. **Saturday Deadline** ‚Äî Byron expects survey synthesis deck AND Innovation Sprint plan by Sat 1/24. 3. **Promotion Details** ‚Äî Larry Lane marked urgent (!!!) ‚Äî needed for 11:00 meeting. --- > [!danger]- Overdue > ```tasks > not done > due before 2026-01-22 > short mode > limit 5 > ``` > [!warning]- Due Today > ```tasks > not done > due on 2026-01-22 > short mode > ``` --- ## Workspace ### Deep Work - ### Meeting Notes **Martin 1:1** - Was able to catch up with Arch Summit videos - Project Polaris - Richard Hoyland - Meeting in NYC to align with Associate Hub - Mapping capabilities - Create a Monday.com card - My action item - Provide a Probabtion period notes to HR (martin to create a draft) - Martin action: Setup Technical Design Authority - MENA - review their setup - My updates - GEA site - https://lockton.sharepoint.com/sites/GlobalEnterpriseArchitecture787 - Showed the ArcKit concept - https://github.com/tractorjuice/arc-kit - file:///Users/karthik/Documents/3%20-%20Resources/Vaults/L2Brain/ea-toolkit/dashboard.html# - -- for his bio journal - Travel to London - He commutes door to door 1.5 hours - 1 mile walk each end to end - get off London bridge - Lives Epston - south of London - border of I25 ### Hackathon Winners Next Steps - Showcase the innovation board ### Promotions _ Jenna Ottemeier 1. Larry Lane -> $166k to $175k (move diff from Mulesoft admin budget $180k) 2. Mark Burtson -> $137k to $146k (move into Megan's role) 3. Brooke McFarland -> $124K -> $130K -> Move into Mark's role - open up her role 4. Mark Burtson | $137K | 146K | Move into Open position 5
Rename from Mulesoft Admin -> Software Architect 2/2 | No | | Brooke McFarland | $124K | $130K | Move into Mark's role - open position. Megan hiring. 6513 - 6511 2/2 | No | | Brooke backfill | 124K | | | Yes | | Open Position 5 | 180K | 146K | Mulesoft -> Software Architect | No | | Open position 7 | 140k | | Autocert Tech Lead - Jake H | | | Open position 2 | 124k | | BA | | | Lawrence backfill - Architect | $134k | | Architect role - bump this up
Move 6511 | | | Cheryl backfill | $156k | | Salesforce architect - Run this by Byron to convert this into an Enterprise Architect vs a Salesforce Architect | | | 1. Megan backfill | $147K | | actively backfilled | | | 6513 | | | EA Architect

| | - I need Puru to be promoted too - Naveen Jannifer Bryant - Excited to help me with the Innovation Sprint - 3 person committee Bryant, Shanna and I - New building Associate Experience - ask my direct reports for input - Relocation impact - what is the monetary impact - Add this to the market adjustment - ### Autocert Available - Brian Roberts & Bocanegra - Leaning towards Injala - Megan shared that there will be IT involvement - There is an AI extraction - Laurel not keen on IT - Launching Injala by Jul - Claude reached out to ### Invoicing Brainstorm Rob Mayo, Amy Guthrie, Brian Bonecutter, Nandini G, Cami Tritsch, Martin Hershy, Jessica Burche **Rob Mayo** - We create invoices in Soluto - Receivables will go into Sagitta - match the invoice number - Cash app can match the money back to invoice app - 60-90 day turnaround Could this work for P&C? **Amy Guthrie** - 6 BUs - Founders is looking to something for the clients ASAP - What other options? **Martin Hershy** - Client Hub - Invoice creation - Invoice delivery - more important - Portal access - real time access to information - important - Payment portal (less of a need) - Dissemnitation of payments - Custom front end - branding - Build custom integrations - APIs - Contract terms automation - Rob priority - installments - calendar of delivery Features - Client facing - Sagitta retirement? - Nexsure retirement? Alternatives - ePay Policy - Affinity & personal lines - Ascend - PRS - Comulate - doesnt do delivery *Note: P&C doesnt really have an AMS - * Next Step - Soluto demo and pricing - Risk requirements - Martin - Hub - Matt Smith, Molly & Phil - Forrester More to come - Direct billing - PWP - Revenue Leakage ### Capture - --- ## Logbook - [x] [!!! Larry Lane - promotion details](things:///show?id=KpxRP5noWu2BUBj1Noxno7) - [x] [Larry, Mark & Brooke promotion](things:///show?id=Gxo7NeMN2GRAmBVyTGFw4j) Confirm with Megan - salaries to communicate

Larry Lane - promotion details](things:///show?id=KpxRP5noWu2BUBj1Noxno7) - [x] [Larry, Mark & Brooke promotion](things:///show?id=Gxo7NeMN2GRAmBVyTGFw4j) Confirm with Megan - salaries to communicate
